titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons, Livingston County Branch records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons

did.unittitle: International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons, Livingston County Branch records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Livingston County branch of Christian interdenominational service organization supporting various ministries to children, to the aged, the handicapped, to those in hospital, and the underprivileged.
archdesc.scopecontent: Constitution; programs of annual conventions, 1927-2003; scrapbooks, 1950s-1982; minutes of annual meetings, 1974-2000; treasurer's book, 1926-1952; clippings, photographs, and miscellaneous.

corpname.primary_name: International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons
